complaint.description: Unable to speak to an operator and get assistance with the Mobile Wi-Fi app issue
complaint.suggestion: Ensure that customers are able to reach a live operator for support

meta.review_title: Unable to speak to an operator
meta.review_content: I need to sort out a problem with Mobile Wi_Fi  app on my cell phone that is supposed to communicate with my router.When i try to connect from my cell phone the app tells me the LAN domain has changed. When I check my pc and go to the mobile wifi page and check the LAN domain and enter it on the app on my phone I still get the same message and cannot connect. When I call the vodacom call centre  one cannot get to speak to an operator. I then try the smart Bot but it is useless. When i explain my problem the bot goes off in a completely different direction. I need to speak to an operator
